description: The hostname or address of the mysql server

actions.name: delete_row
actions.description: Deletes one or more rows from a table

actions.name: execute_query
actions.description: Executes a query on the mysql database and returns the results

actions.name: get_tables
actions.description: Returns a list of tables in the database

actions.name: insert_row
actions.description: Inserts a new row into a table

actions.name: update_row
actions.description: Updates one or more rows in a table
